title: Some stuff!
description: A short description of the post.
contents:
Look at this cool plot! Different font!


library(tidyverse)

mtcars %>% 
  ggplot(aes(disp, mpg)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth() +
  labs(title = "cool!") +
  theme(text = element_text(family = "serif"))

title: Welcome to Distill!!! :~)
description:
Welcome to our new blog, Distill!!! :~). We hope you enjoy 
reading what we have to say!
